meta.title: Efficiently manage interactive itineraries | Trip Imagine
meta.description: Call us now, we can get you a free quote in under 10 minutes.

homeSection2.title: Receive your money quickly
homeSection2.listItem2: We come to tow at no cost

homeSection3.title: A solution that comes to you
homeSection3.listItem2: We come to tow at no cost

card1.title: Vehicle in any condition
card1.description: We take care of towing your damaged, rusty, mechanical problem vehicle, etc. Whatever the problem, we help you eliminate it by recycling your car for you at no cost.

card2.title: An unbeatable offer
card2.description: No need to move. Simply call us to receive an incomparable proposal for your vehicle, in a few minutes, with one of our agents.

card3.title: Recycle your car
card3.description: We collect the vehicle parts to give a new life to the reusable elements. You contribute to the good of the planet by allowing us to reuse the parts of your used car.

offer1.description: The offer varies according to the current price of the metal, the weight and the condition of the vehicle.

offer2.description: The agent on the phone will be able to give you an offer, for your used vehicle, according to the information on the condition of the vehicle that you are going to provide to us.

step1.title: Contact
step1.description: Call us now. Simply provide us with the make of the vehicle, the model, the year, the condition of the vehicle and the reason you want to recycle the vehicle.

step2.title: Collect
step2.description: As soon as you accept the offer from one of our agents, we can send one of our recyclers to your address to recycle the vehicle and to give you your payment.

homeSection6.title: We can make a cash offer on your car only if:

viewDemoModal.title: Try Trip Imagine for free
viewDemoModal.description: Please enter your email so we can send you a link to the trial
